column4: i have a game which worked well on my laptop ubuntu 11.10 with wine. But i tried installing it on ubuntu 10.04 it did not work. instead the computer goes in hibernation. what can i do?
and the version of wine you are using is identical?
the thing is i promised my mom that this game and all her activities which she did on winxp(which was way 2 slow ) can be done easiiy so she agreed to migrate but now its not wokring
